idea-plugin.name: Copy for LLM Plus
idea-plugin.description:
Iteration of the original Copy for LLM plugin, now offering enhanced control over formatting, language annotations, and output customization for seamless integration with modern LLMs.
Enhanced Features:
  • Customizable output formats: Markdown, JSON, or plain text.
  • Language & syntax metadata to boost LLM context understanding.
  • Advanced file-filter settings with binary-file detection.
  • Integration presets for ChatGPT, Anthropic, and more.
Right-click on files/folders in the Project view and select "Copy for LLM Plus".

action.description: Copy project structure and content for LLM prompts with enhanced options
